mapper.delete: DELETE from follow where follow_followerId=#{0} and follow_followingId=#{1}
mapper.select: SELECT artwork.* , IF(collection_id>0,true,false) as hasCollect from ( SELECT follow_followingId from follow where follow_followerId=#{0} ) B left join artwork on artwork.artwork_artistId=B.follow_followingId left join collection on collection.user_id=#{0} and collection.artwork_id=artwork.artwork_id order by artwork_id desc limit #{1},24
